price: Nígbà tí àwọn àmì Wa tó fojú hàn kedere sì dé bá wọn, wọ́n wí pé: “Èyí ni idán pọ́nńbélé.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
